name: prosperously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is successful, usually in earning a lot of money: The town is a prosperously suburban place. She prosperously runs a small import business. See
prosperous
More examplesFewer examplesWe live in a prosperously bourgeois district.Her new songs are constructed in the same moody, minor-chord way that has worked so prosperously.Various countries prosperously feed our passion for throwaway fashion.
